text: Local Module Development: “host_template_types” property is being replaced with “content_types” Local Module Development: “host_template_types” property is being replaced with “content_types” The `host_template_types` array property for modules is being replaced with the `content_types` array property. The new `content_types` property is more robust and will allow for greater specificity regarding where modules can be used. Starting January 29th, 2024, all accounts will begin referencing this new property. Read more about this change on our changelog. :rolled_up_newspaper: View on Changelog button :mega: Discuss on Community Forum button
